author: Mike Angelo
title: Drone Drop Pop-up
projectObjective: Bahlsen asked us to execute an innovative marketing campaign to launch their new branding to promote brand recognition and drive consumers to stores.
mainKeypointDescription: We took over a popular shopping district in Montclair, NJ and filmed a fleet of drones delivering boxes of Bahlsen's products to unsuspecting people walking by. This generated a huge buzz in the region and successfully increased sales.

projectKeypoints.title: A Once-in-a-Lifetime Event
projectKeypoints.description: My team and I worked on numerous different pre-production tasks. We hired drone operators, sketched a rough storyboard, coordinated with a camera crew, and captured a once-in-a-lifetime event.

projectKeypoints.title: Supplemental Digital Marketing
projectKeypoints.description: We developed a rich media marketing campaign to target and retarget potential and repeat shoppers. This included animated and interactive web banners and pre-roll video.

projectKeypoints.title: Social Media Content
projectKeypoints.description: We filmed all preparation before and during the event. Then we delivered numerous video edits and behind-the-scenes bits and ran them on both paid and organic social media channels.

author: Mike Angelo
title: Loopwell: The Space for Well-being
projectObjective: The founders of Loopwell set out to create a unique holistic well-being brand that operates as a wellness ecosystem as well as a production and event venue.
mainKeypointDescription: I worked with the founders and a team to develop a memorable feel-good brand, a powerful website with an event and e-commerce system, and various marketing materials. We successfully cultivated a following and membership and hosted countless seminars, luxury events, and high-quality productions.

projectKeypoints.title: Hit the Ground Running
projectKeypoints.description: While the building was being renovated, we went through a ton of different ideas trying to find the right branding to really carve out a place for us in the space.

projectKeypoints.title: Building a Powerful Site
projectKeypoints.description: We needed an intuitive website that managed events, attendees, memberships, and payments. I helped design and develop the website along with custom integrations and scripts that suited their needs.

projectKeypoints.title: Event Promotion & A/V Production
projectKeypoints.description: I worked with a team to film events, set up live streaming and other production necessities, and compile edits and marketing materials that could be used as promotion for both the event staff as well as the Loopwell brand.
